comments.author: Marcel Reutegger
comments.body:
XAVersionManager.checkin() did not add the frozen node to the xaItems map.

Fixed in revision: 638303

comments.author: Jukka Zitting
comments.body: Merged to the 1.4 branch in revisions 650317 and 650325.

description:
This only happens when the operations are enclosed in an XA transaction.
See test: org.apache.jackrabbit.core.version.RestoreTest
summary: Restore to base version throws NullPointerException
